casebody.data:
IN the INTEREST OF: R.L.C.-E. a/k/a R.C.-E., a Minor Petition of: J.C., Mother In the Interest of: G.J.C.-E. a/k/a G.C.E., a Minor Petition of: J.C., Mother No. 83 EM 2018
No. 84 EM 2018 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania. August 15, 2018

ORDER

PER CURIAM .

AND NOW, this 15th day of August, 2018, the Application for Leave to File Petition for Allowance of Appeal Nunc Pro Tunc is GRANTED. Counsel is directed to file the already-prepared Petition for Allowance of Appeal within five days.
